body:
I created, concretized and installed a Spack Environment.  `module avail` verified that a bunch of modules had been created.  Then I ran:
```
spack -e myenv env loads -r
```
It replied:
```
To load this environment, type:
   source .../spack/var/spack/environments/research/loads
```
The `loads` file is created, but NOTHING IS IN IT.  This used to work, now it's mysteriously stopped working.  Frustrating.
title: `spack env loads` broken
